arn.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the CloudFront real-time log configuration.

endpoint.description: The Amazon Kinesis data streams where real-time log data is sent.

fields.description: The fields that are included in each real-time log record. See the [AWS documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/real-time-logs.html#understand-real-time-log-config-fields) for supported values.

name.description: The unique name to identify this real-time log configuration.

samplingRate.description: The sampling rate for this real-time log configuration. The sampling rate determines the percentage of viewer requests that are represented in the real-time log data. An integer between `1` and `100`, inclusive.

samplingRate.description: The sampling rate for this real-time log configuration. The sampling rate determines the percentage of viewer requests that are represented in the real-time log data. An integer between `1` and `100`, inclusive.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering RealtimeLogConfig resources.
